isis.stitle: TSI 08-12-05 - Exhaust Diesel Particulate Filter (DPF) Serial Number Location

subjectgroup.subject: Exhaust Diesel Particulate Filter (DPF) Serial Number Location

geninfo.para: This TSI details the procedure to locate the DPF serial number location used on International trucks, buses and chassis.

svcproc.title: Service procedure

warning.para: To avoid personal injury or death, shift transmission to neutral or park, set parking brake, and block wheels before doing diagnostic or service procedures.

svcproc.para: All DPF units have a serial number etched into the canister or a metal tag that is welded onto the canister body. These numbers might be very difficult to locate since location/position varies by truck model/engine manufacturer/application. In addition dirt and grease may mask the numbers once the truck has been placed in service. An appropriate cleaner may be required to remove the dirt and grease from the canister surface so the serial number can be identified.
